application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required by Condition 3 (submission of details - a)  elevation (1:10) and section (1:5) drawings of fanlight; b) section (1:5) drawings of relationship between new floor finishes and hearths) of Listed Building consent LB/24/07012 (Alterations to lower ground, ground, second, and third floor layouts; installation of underfloor heating on lower ground and ground floors; boiler flue installation in plant room located on lower ground floor front; installation of fanlight above kitchen door; replacement of tiles in front LGF lightwell; modifications to master bathroom at 2nd floor; installation of underfloor heating in bathrooms on second and third floors; plus installation of wine cellar under staircase on lower ground floor)
